summary: This is an email chain from May 6, 2020, discussing media coverage related to the Epstein case. It references a New York Law Journal article titled 'The Prince and the Proffer' and a New York Daily News article reporting on Judge Berman's comments criticizing DOJ policies post-Epstein during a fraud sentencing.

persons.name: Judge Berman
persons.context: Mentioned as commenting on his objections to DOJ policies and investigations following the Epstein case during a fraud sentencing, as reported by the New York Daily News.

events.title: Judge Berman's Comments on DOJ Post-Epstein
events.description: Judge Berman commented during a fraud sentencing on his objections to DOJ policies and investigations following the Epstein case, as reported in the New York Daily News.

keyFacts: An email from May 6, 2020, references media coverage about the Epstein case.
The email mentions a New York Law Journal article titled 'The Prince and the Proffer'.
The email also references a New York Daily News article reporting Judge Berman's criticism of DOJ policies post-Epstein.
Judge Berman made his comments during a fraud sentencing proceeding.
